LanguageData.AIChip.label: AI Chip
LanguageData.AIChip.description: Through special chemicals and electric shocks this little chip is able to significantly boost the users consciousness and mobility.
LanguageData.SyntheticLung.label: Synthetic Lung
LanguageData.SyntheticLung.description: A high-tech breathing replacement. Makes a soft whirring sound.
LanguageData.SyntheticStomach.label: Synthetic Stomach
LanguageData.SyntheticStomach.description: An enhanced stomach augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticLiver.label: Synthetic Liver
LanguageData.SyntheticLiver.description: An enhanced liver augmented with synthetic fibers to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticKidney.label: Synthetic Kidney
LanguageData.SyntheticKidney.description: An enhanced kidney augmented with synthetic fibers to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticHeart.label: Synthetic Heart
LanguageData.SyntheticHeart.description: A top-of-the-line heart replacement. Can last for over 30 years on a single charge.
LanguageData.SyntheticSkin.label: Synthetic Skin
LanguageData.SyntheticSkin.description: A small piece of an interesting looking skin-like material. Feels like real skin.
LanguageData.Joywire.label: joywire
LanguageData.Joywire.description: This little brain implant will make you feel happy and relaxed. Requires brain surgery research before installing.
LanguageData.Painstopper.label: painstopper
LanguageData.Painstopper.description: This brain implant will make you not feel pain. Requires brain surgery research before installing.
